```{r setup, message=FALSE}



library(covid19br)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)

states <- downloadCovid19("states")

states  <- states %>%
  filter(date == max(date)) %>%
  left_join(ibgeStates, by = c("state_code", "state", "pop", "region")) %>%
  st_as_sf()

ggplot(states) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = pop)) 

ggplot(states) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = pop)) +
  scale_fill_gradient2(low = "red", high = "red", na.value = NA)

```
